name: Rhythm Monster Chef
description:
This game was made for the  #mixandgamejam  with the topic "Mixing Genres".

The restaurant "Bone Appetit" needs a new cook! Jam to your favorite music and help the restaurant deliver spooky meals.

Made by: 

Christian -Samb- Wasser - Game Design, Programming

Alexander Sahling - 3D Art 

Melanie Sidthiphol - 3D Art

 Emanuela Ardelean - 2D Art 

 Ben Zimmermann - Music
